about.title: About me
about.description: Hi! My name is Sebastian. I am a programmer with knowledge of both the front-end and the back-end, although I prefer working with the front-end kind of things. I like to work with teams to gain experience and grow my skills to a greater level.

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: As I've mentioned before, my main skills fall into the front-end side, and so these are the tools that I work with
skills.softSkillsDescription: In a work environment is not only what technical knowledge you have that's important, so here are my strengths as an individual

courses.title: Courses
courses.description: These are the courses that I've taken

coursesArray.title: Ultimate Web
coursesArray.description: Learn web development with HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, ES6 React and Node

coursesArray.title: React: de cero a experto
coursesArray.description: Context API, MERN, Hooks, Firestore, JWT, Testing, Autenticaciones, Despliegues, CRUD, Logs, MUI, Multiple Routers...

coursesArray.title: Learn JS HTML CSS
coursesArray.description: Learn the main languages that dominate the Internet: JavaScript, HTML5 and CSS3.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: These are some of the projects I have worked on by myself.

projectsArray.title: PokeWordle
projectsArray.description: Wordle was a hit in the 2022 game trend for a while, and I thought about making a Wordle... but with Pokemon instead!

projectsArray.title: Password Generator
projectsArray.description: A secure Password Generator, if you want a secure password so that you can make sure that your account is safe as possible, you can use this tool to help you.

projectsArray.title: To Do App
projectsArray.description: A simple To Do App made with pure JS, CSS & HTML

projectsArray.title: Pomodoro App with Electron
projectsArray.description: Pomodoro is a technique of concentrating that I often opt when studying. Then I decided to make my own Pomodoro desktop app with Electron.

projectsArray.title: React-Gallery
projectsArray.description: A simple gallery made with React. All of the images have no copyright and were put free to use in Unsplash.

projectsArray.title: JAP E-Commerce
projectsArray.description: JAP ('Jovenes a Programar') is an Uruguayan program that teaches the young people of the country to code, this was a project-based learing experience in wich we had to figure out how to make certain aspects of the webpage.

projectsArray.title: Weather App
projectsArray.description: A weather application, made with vanilla JavaScript and Bootstrap, which makes use of the free OpenWeather API.

languages.title: Languages
languages.description: Just like this page anticipates, I am bilingual!

es.title: Spanish
es.description: I have native level of Spanish since I am from Uruguay and have lived a long time in Spain.

en.title: English
en.description: I professional level knowledge of the English Language (C1).
